text: Jean Lèques (31 August 1931 – 1 June 2022)Jean Lèques, ancien maire de Nouméa, est mort was a New Caledonian politician. He was mayor of Nouméa from 1986 to 2014. From 1999 and 2001 he was the first president of the government of New Caledonia. Lèques was born in Nouméa. He was a member of The Rally–UMP. Lèques died on 1 June 2022 in Nouméa, aged 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French mayors
title: Jean Lèques
